meta_description: The Fitchburg Art Museum is the leading cultural institution in North Central Massachusetts.

## Museum Hours:

**Wednesday – Friday: 12 PM – 4 PM  
Saturday – Sunday: 11 AM – 5 PM  
[FAM at Night](https://fitchburgartmuseum.org/fam-at-night/): 12 PM – 7 PM**

FAM is Free and Open to the Public

admission_text:
#### PLAN YOUR VISIT

* * *

### Hours & Information

  * __

**Wednesday:** noon to 4pm

  * __

**Thursday:** noon to 4pm

  * __

**Friday:** noon to 4 p.m.

  * __

**Saturday:** 11am to 5pm

  * __

**Sunday:** 11am to 5pm  

  * __

**First Thursday of each month:** noon to 7pm

##### FAM is closed Mondays & Tuesdays, as well as:

  * __

New Year’s Day

  * __

Easter Sunday

  * __

Independence Day

  * __

Thanksgiving

  * __

Christmas

The Fitchburg Art Museum is now **Free and Open to the Public**!

**Members** _Learn more about the benefits of_[ _Membership here_](https://fitchburgartmuseum.org/membership/)[ _!_](https://fitchburgartmuseum.org/membership/)

* * *

  * __

**Address:**[185 Elm Street, Fitchburg, MA 01420](https://maps.app.goo.gl/DuhvSHsFyX1YHR4c6)

  * __

**Email:** [info@fitchburgartmuseum.org](mailto:info@fitchburgartmuseum.org)

  * __

**Phone:**[978.345.4207](tel:9783454207)

[](https://fitchburgartmuseum.org/wp-content/uploads/2025/04/FAM-Maps_March-2025.png)

#### Know Before You Go

  * Masks are optional but encouraged for all visitors over the age of 5, regardless of vaccination status.

  * Large bags, umbrellas, as well as food or drink are prohibited in the galleries.
  * Light snacks and drinks are available for purchase in the lobby. Guest are welcome to bring their own food to enjoy outside in our courtyard. Please ask Front Desk for local restaurant recommendations.
  * Curious about what to expect during your visit? Watch our ...
